uvi.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.12.11
uvi.description:
KVM: x86: Ensure liveliness of nested VM-Enter fail tracepoint message

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.12.11 by commit 9fb088ce13bc3c59a51260207b487db3e556f275, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 380e0055bc7e4a5c687436ba3ccebb4667836b95. For more details please see the references link.
